website_summaries.verdict: Impressive audio experience with XXL ear cups and surround sound.
pros: Equipped with 7.1 surround sound, which excels at picking up in-game sound effects
Ear cups are made with firm yet supportive foam that doesn’t degrade or compress
Noise-cancelling microphone is retractable, making it easy to use in headphone-only mode
cons: As it’s designed for PC use, it only has a USB output with no option for a 3.5mm jack
Must download software to achieve 7.1 surround sound effect

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat this headset for $30!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing headset for the price. Very comfortable, easy to access controls. Thick padding isolates outside noise and has a nice tight grip, I have a rather "thin" head, so headphones are typically too large, but these fit nice and snug. The audio was through the mic was clear and everyone in my party had 0 complaints. The remote clip is a great touch and allows users to position it and reduce the weight when moving your head around, though the remote is very light. The RGB Lights are a cool effect, but not necessary IMO. I would recommend this headset to everyone looking for a USB headset!
customer_reviews.author: TeckUp

customer_reviews.title: 7.1 Surround Sound Drivers Discontinued
customer_reviews.text: As one comment from the producer now shows, the driver files that enable the 7.1 surround sound feature are no longer available, which means the 7.1 feature is not a feature. The product description should be updated to reflect this.
customer_reviews.author: Henry F.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sound quality. If you haven't had good headphones before, you would not know.
customer_reviews.text: Sound was muffled as though I had cardboard between the ear cups and my ears. Website on manual for 7.1 EQ software is permanently down and is actually at driver.jeeco.com No matter how close I tuned the EQ to my Cloud X2's there was still random distortion and muffling that couldn't be tuned out and still ended up sounding like I was listening through a Party cup. Most reviews are from parents who buy the headset for kids or adults who don't know what a good headset sounds like. I wouldn't even use these in an emergency. It felt like punishment listening through them. I'd rather go without sound. For real. I think the review videos were paid off.
customer_reviews.author: Edgarhighmen

customer_reviews.title: Best headset I have ever experienced!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this headset for business, not gaming; I am an online teacher. I previously had been buying what I thought were decent headsets (think Logitech) but they were only lasting a year. After my fourth headset, I decided to splurge a bit and purchased this one based on its high reviews and the fact that the video showed it is easily used with a PC, whereas others were showing with gaming consoles. I was completely blown away by the noise-canceling quality and the incredible stereo sound! I gave these the "Bowie test" and was very pleased to clearly hear both tracks of "Space Oddity" beautifully! I highly recommend this headset for any sound based use you may have!
customer_reviews.author: pandora09

customer_reviews.title: DRIVERS DO NOT WORK!
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations with these headphones, they look cool, feel great, but the sound quality is awful! I tried to go and install the 7.1 drivers in hopes the sound would improve, but I was sadly mistaken! The drivers won't even work! I try to install them and I get a message saying to plug in my headphones to the computer, yet they are already plugged in! I have tried to troubleshoot this issue for well over an hour, with no luck! Very disappointed in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Ben Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great sound at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I buy a LOT of items on Amazon but I don't leave a whole lot of reviews. I'm setting up a gaming station in a vacation home so I didn't want to spend a fortune on accessories, and I forgot to bring my SteelSeries gaming headset, so I picked up a set of these. I really like them, they have a bit of bulk to them but they're still quite comfortable, as the piece that rests on your head plus the ears both have decent amounts of padding. The noise cancelling isn't superb but that's not why I bought them. The sound, for the price, I think is quite good. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Korff

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mom & dad mute mechanisms!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these! I don’t. They have excellent noise cancellation! Too good. Then he gets mad when I ding his phone instead of holler through the house or even attempt getting his attention and go into his room! I’ve had to wave arms and jump up and down! I tell him to turn them down, but it may not even be up too loud! What am I supposed to do? ;) They’re good, but do watch your ears. My hubs is only in his early 40s (yes, that’s still pretty young) and is already losing his hearing. So, you guys be careful. Sorry for the mom talk.
customer_reviews.author: Amy AF

customer_reviews.title: It is only for pc and it’s the best
customer_reviews.text: This is really good it came in a really nice packaging and its really good for gaming if you want to shop lay games and want a headset get this because this perfect
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: So Bad!
customer_reviews.text: Given how cheap they were I tried to give this headset a chance. The mic seems to work okay, but the headset smells like a chemical waste dump and sounds like someone dragged it behind a truck for a while before sticking it into the box. The lowest quality audio I've encountered since embedded motherboard speakers. Save yourself the hassle of a return and spend a little more when a decent headset is on sale.
customer_reviews.author: mtvG

customer_reviews.title: Nice headset but does not have voice monitoring even with the software
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset specifically because there was a manufacturer note that it had voice monitoring (where you can hear yourself in your headphones). I downloaded the software and there are very few options included. Voice monitoring certainly was not one. You can set any headphones in windows to play your voice through the headset but there is a slight delay and it is absolutely aggravating. A headset with true voice monitoring does not have that issue. While the sound itself was nice, the sound was also bleeding into my external mic for recording and that won't do for my purposes. I also have a small head and these were even a bit tight for me. Had to return these.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.C

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very comfortable headset. Right away, I was impressed with the sound and the noise cancellation. I found the included card that took me to driver.jeecoo.com and made it easy to get the drivers. The booklet sent me to the main site, which is in Chinese, and you cannot download from unless you have a China phone number. So.. luckily I found the card after about 30 min of looking for it. After that, I haven’t had a complaint really so far. The mic tucks up nicely and doesn’t flop around. Even while playing a game on one monitor and streaming a show on the other, the 7.1 sound was noticeable with the direction of the sounds.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wolfley

customer_reviews.title: Just okay....
customer_reviews.text: These suckers are HEAVY! They are big and difficult to get on and off. The way the wires are set up with the clip, there is always a strange, unwieldy loop up at the neck/ear end that flops around. You can't quite throw it over your shoulder or tuck it somewhere, so it just hangs. Annoying. The sound quality is okay, but the volume is not nearly as loud as we would like. They are sturdy and the cords are nicely wrapped. I'll give them that. Hopefully, they won't break down.
customer_reviews.author: M. McB

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing headphones! My boyfriend and I are gamers and he picked out these Jeeco gaming headphones for us and I am glad he did because he chose a quality one! They fit snug on my head but not too tight and the ear pieces are comfortable and do not irritate my ears like other gaming headphones. I love the volume adjuster and the clip attachment comes in handy to keep the cord at bay. Great sound volume and the noise cancellation really works! When we game people tell us our sound and mic sounds crystal clear with no static or cut-outs. Absolutely worth the buy! The style is sleek and simple with just enough light to make it pop. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this package was a return. The box was damaged. It did not seem factory packaged. I do not know how it rates for gaming. I'm not a gamer. Using Zoom, it works good. Listening to music, it was very clear. However, 20-20k frequency response, I have my doubts. I played music on it that I played with other speakers. It seemed to have very weak bass response, missing drums that were on other speakers. The extreme highs seemed muffled also. Would I need that 7.1 driver software to hear the highs and lows? The headphones themselves, seem to keep out external sounds very well.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Good for Video Conferencing/home office
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work conferencing (services like Zoom, GoToMeeting, Webex). Works fine, excellent mic & earphone sound quieting. Even deadens the background noise when the landscapers walk by the window with a leaf blower. Seems sturdily made Only complaint that lowers from 5 to 4 stars is that the fabric sheath on the cord makes a low rustling as it brushes against your clothing. You can actually hear it in the left earphone, although none of the people I'm talking to have ever heard it and it doesn't impact incoming sound either. Only a minor annoyance that just occasionally makes you check to see if you are accidentally un-muted.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Guy

customer_reviews.title: comfortable, light, good sound quality, and no special drivers needed (Win10)!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price. Well balanced sound, adequate bass without being boomy. Efficient speaker drivers. Comfortable to wear for gaming or video meetings. I like the manual switch for turning off the mic and the separate controls for mic and speaker volume. No special drivers are required for Win10. "it just works". 7.1 "surround sound" drivers are available at manuf. website. These are not noise-cancelling headphones (which is not expected at this <$50 price point). The over-the-ear cuffs isolate sound effectively, though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Turner

customer_reviews.title: This product is very customizable and it is especially great for gaming, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product for its noise cancellation and its surround sound. I mostly use this headphone for gaming and sometimes to talk wi others and i am very pleased with it, you can hear everything very clearly. One thing i really like about this product is that how customizable it is, i can turn off and on the lights and then turn down or turn up my microphone and speaker volume which is amazing because most headphones or similar products to this product do not have that much customizability. I highly recommend this product especially for gaming. Great job to the people who made this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa Dinc.

customer_reviews.title: Driver Download does not work
customer_reviews.text: I have never seen a software download requiring a rar or a zip decompressing tool? wow and then i have to look for a setup.exe application for finally getting the message "Don't support this platform"........ wow what is this? It should be so simple to download a driver, and their website has an e-mail listed with a number that seems to be a local Chinese number. I understand that this is a budget headset, but would it be possible to have a chat or number that we can call from the western world? a 400 toll free Chinese number is not enough if you want do do business in USA, sorry but looks like this headset is going back
customer_reviews.author: Vouvou

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit but heavy and bulky.
customer_reviews.text: This headset looks nice but is a bit bulkier than I would have liked. Sound is good. Microphone seems to be good, too (no one has complained they can't hear me, so that's good). Very comfortable over the ears, but again, they are bulky and heavy. The headset comes with a sound control which feels like it could break easily. There are click switches on the side of the sound control which just seem like they might easily break. Care will be needed, I'm afraid. All-in-all, not the best headphone/microphone combo but certainly not the worst. 3.5/5 would be my rating because of the business, weight, and the sound control.
customer_reviews.author: Ranter

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR LOW TALKERS
customer_reviews.text: I play games at night on PC when my child goes to bed. I downloaded the driver and adjusted every setting including in game settings. May partners online could hear me breath but could not hear me talk unless I cupped the mic to my mouth. Not to mention the distance from the left earphone to the tip of the mic is definitely made for a child's head and not adult as it did not reach the front of my mouth. The mic could only pick up audio when I was practically yelling in it. This is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Comfort above all!
customer_reviews.text: While I'm not a serious gamer, I spend many hours at my computer. These headphones are totally comfortable and I just used them for 3 hours nonstop without getting that weird ear/head pressure that usually makes me switch to earphone for a while. This is due to the cushioning I think because it feels real high quality and not flimsy, random foam. I really don't know what makes them comfortable, but it's on those ground that I recommend these headphones for anyone that spend a long time on a computer listening to music or watching videos and hates the discomfort of other headphones.
customer_reviews.author: cristobal rendon

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfortable headset—using for telecommutting
customer_reviews.text: Bought for work, as I work from home and am on several online meetings a day. The noise cancelling is so good! Only drawback is that I cannot hear myself as well due to it and I sometimes feel I am yelling. Comfortable, as long as I make sure my ears are fully inside and not being pressed by the pads. I have to put my computer glasses on after and make sure the earpieces are above the headsets ear pieces or the pressure between headsets and glasses causes some pain. Overall, very good, and I recommend. I can’t install the surround sound driver on my work laptop without admin approval, but sound is still very good.
customer_reviews.author: Lissabee

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For The Price
customer_reviews.text: My old headphones were not working so I decided to order another one. I saw this on Amazon at an affordable price and didn't expect much from it but when I got it and plugged it in, I was very surprised. The sound is awesome, it's very snug and doesn't hurt my ears at all after wearing it for a long time. I stream video games and it is crystal clear when I use the headset. I would recommend this for anyone who is on a budget and looking for an excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: not what you expect.
customer_reviews.text: Sub par quality.. Try to download driver for better sound quality. Nothing is in English on site. also feel like my security is compromised trying to download anything off the site. Which I was unable to do. If you are going to sell in other markets have options for their language or send software with the product. I paid for 7.1 and cant use it. false advertising. also can only have microphone on left ear. It would be awesome to have rotating microphone so I can have it on either side of my face that I want. Right side would be what I want but cant do it with your set up.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as I would like
customer_reviews.text: I bought these 10 months ago and they have been fine for gaming and zoom meetings. But I just had the same problem I have had with the last few headphones I have owned. The left side plastic part that connects the ear piece to the band over the head broke. I was pulling the ear pieces open to slide them off my ears when it snapped. The thing is the band going over the head is much larger and thicker then the point where it connects to the ear piece. So that connection is the weak point. Not sure why they do that unless it is for planned obsolescence.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Readers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I hear things that no one else on my team can hear! Even when my teammates have really loud background noise going on. This has been working well for about 2 months so far with zero problems. (I use it a lot, too.) Economical and I have really enjoyed using them. Oh yeah, and the last pair of earphones I had, that died, had all kinds of issues, including painful ears after using them for an hour or more. These are super comfy! Keep in mind, I am no audiophile, but I do like to hear what's going on in a game. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Amy E.

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional bang for the buck. Great sound for the price point. They block out a remarkable amount of sound - so if you want passive sound-blocking these are great. I don't hear when others walk into the room, I don't hear sounds from the rest of the house. The space heater sitting next to me is inaudible with these on. Comfortable for long periods of time. I wear an XXXL motorcycle helmet and many baseball caps won't fit my head and these fit and stay on just fine. Good looking as well. I do wish by default they would have the lighting OFF rather than on, but that's a very minor issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Meirose

customer_reviews.title: Nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Many people complain about headphones being too heavy or too uncomfortable on their head. I bought these and they seemed to get the job done perfectly. I have had them for over a month and they have worked flawlessly. I recommended them to a couple of my friends because they were looking for headphones and it's easier to order online than to go to a store where you can't see any reviews or anything. If you already have a pair of good headphones, buy these in case you need a backup, like if a friend comes over. If you are looking for a good pair of headphones and a generally decent price, no need to keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: EliteReviewsUSA

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Son needed new headphones for his computer and I didn't want to spend a fortune so I got these. They feel a bit heavy but son says they feel just fine for him. Gaming - 5 stars - When son has these on, he can game for hours and hours. Noise Cancelling - 5 stars - When son has these on, he can't hear a thing my wife or I say. Sound Quality - 4 stars - When I voice chat with my son, his voice sounds just a bit strange when he uses the mic, like it's not deep enough. Overall rating - 5 stars - This was a great purchase for the price and does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anwyl

customer_reviews.title: Noise Cancelling is Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This headset is great. I've had no problems once I got them set up and adjusted all my programs to accept them I was good to go. The sound is clear, the surround sound is a clear quality. The cute light effect on the side is a bonus, the ability to turn it off and not create distractions when others are sleeping and I'm not is better. I will update more as I continue use and experiment with these in different settings. They are certainly comfortable and I'm not feeling my ears get hot despite this being my second hour wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headset!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset. I have a headset that was super expensive because I like the brand alot but they felt cheap and give me headaches when I wear them too long. Theis headset is so comfortable, easy set up, I'm so happy with them. I don't dread having to go into discord anymore. I bought these to buy time till I could get a newer version of some "gamer" headset but I loves these headphones so much I dont wanna replace them now. I would love a wireless version of this headset but for the price and quality of the headset the wired connection is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great noise cancellation !!
customer_reviews.text: I had initially got these for me but my son stole them from me -:) He is 9 years old and when he told me that he would like to use them for his online math class..I was like...hey they are not going to be comfortable for you and I gave him another pair....a more costly one....but these would not stay on him well and were not comfortable and so he tried these....these look big on him but fit very well...it is comfortable and does not hurt him..the sound and mic quality is very nice...also the fact that it cancels the noise outside when listening and speaking helps him a lot with this classes !! Definitely recommend these !!
customer_reviews.author: Naresh

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I got these headphones a few months back with high hopes, and I loved them while they lasted. They were the best set of headphones I'd had, and I planned on keeping them for a long while. Well, this was shortlived because I drop it one foot and one of the sides break off. For about 2 weeks I had to play with one headphone (right side) dangling by the wire, and no matter how much tape or glue I put, nothing could fix it sadly. Soon the right ear no longer worked, and I bought another headset but it could never match this one :(
customer_reviews.author: Mayme Jefferson

customer_reviews.title: Great for gaming, but not so much for conference calls on the computer
customer_reviews.text: I got this headset thinking I could use it for my video remote interpreting setup, but it turns out it was not great for that. On my end, the sound was excellent and it was super comfortable, on the other end, the person could hear me great sometimes, and sometimes it sounded as "robotic" or "metallic". I tried it out on different platforms with different people and concluded it was not reliable for my work, so I gave it to my son, who is loving using it for playing video games and talking to his friends!
customer_reviews.author: C. Falconi

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband has gone through dozens of headphones. I got him these for Christmas and he is more than impressed. He says the ear pads are the perfect fit, not too snug but really do shut the other sounds out. He loves the surround part of the sound. He played with them for about 20 minutes online getting the sounds just the way he liked them and now says that they are the best headphones he has ever had. He plays a lot of games and says that the mic is one of the best he has used as well. Very much recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy E. Hoeck

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat for money
customer_reviews.text: I got these specifically to play WoWs. I haven't used a headset for gaming before so didn't want to spend a lot on my first unit. These have performed admirably with mic clarity others have told me comes across very good. Headphones only a little uncomfortable on my big noggin but fine. The control module bugs me a little, something you could clip on your shirt but I find it often in the way but I can position it so it doesn't bother me as much. For the money, these are hard to beat and I don't regret the purchase at all. They also seem to have good construction and belie their cost.
customer_reviews.author: IIAGDTR

customer_reviews.title: Good buy so far!
customer_reviews.text: I'm just getting into gaming with my grandson and I wanted headphones with a mike but I didn't want to spend a bundle of money. These headphones seem reasonably well built and my grandson says that the mike sound is much better than the mike I was using in the past. The sound is good but not exceptional, certainly good for the price. The only question is how long they will last. They are a little tight and I can't wear them for more than about an hour at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Hatchetjoe

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones for Chromebook and PCs
customer_reviews.text: Our kids are all at home at the moment because of the virus and with a large family they could be getting on each other's nerves while they are all connected to their school classes. So I bought two of these to solve this issue. They work really well and are very durable. I would definitely recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Graham

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for working from home since I have a lot of conference calls. I haven’t had any issues with it. Affordable and does what it’s supposed to. The one thing I would change is make the large button on the controller the Mute button. It is currently the button to turn the side colors on and off. It doesn’t seem like that should be the main focus and most easily accessed button. The mute function itself is a sliding switch that is a little harder to switch on and off with one hand.
customer_reviews.author: Sean K

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones / Microphone
customer_reviews.text: I picked up these headphones to use with my games and movies since we have a loud house. They worked perfectly on my PC and plugged into my Roku remote. Then I discovered how well the microphone worked -- my online students couldn't tell the difference between this microphone and my expensive desktop microphone. I use this set for my streaming (Twitch and Mixerr), my YouTube voice-overs, my teaching, my tv/movies, and my games. My ONLY critique is that the fit a bit tight, but then I have a head shaped like a large bowling ball, so that's partially my fault I believe. :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Cord length and placement on the headphones are bothersome
customer_reviews.text: The headset is good for the price, been using it for a few months now and dont have complaints with the sound quality. However, the length of the cord is too short and having the cord connect to the left speaker makes it so that the wire would drape onto my right arm. As I game or do work the cord would just rub against my arm, and at first i told myself i would get use to but till this day it bothers me, and the cord is too short to have it wrap around my setup. Good headset, just can't get over the the cord placement and length
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I thought I found the headphones of my dreams. The sound quality was great, as well as noise cancellation and cushiony earmuffs. However, they were so tight against my head--AND I HAVE A SMALL HEAD...I MEAN PEANUT HEAD-- I kept getting a headache; this is funny because I was looking for light headphones. I thought they would loosen in time, but they were still tight, so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Kokopuffs

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, moderately comfortable, good mic
customer_reviews.text: Really good headphones, especially for the price. Sound quality is loud but not to loud, and it comes in clear. Hearing footsteps and other noises in games can be pretty important, and this headset picks them up pretty well. This actually has one of the clearest mics of used in a while too, even better then some of the “higher” end headsets. My only complaint was the padding in the left ear wasn’t as thick as in the right ear, so that ear does tend to hurt after a while.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for voice recordings/meetings
customer_reviews.text: Due to the work from home conditions, all of the professional development and meetings for my organization moved to a virtual setting. Prior to purchasing this headset, I had gone through two others looking for a particular sound quality on my video recordings. This gaming headset, by far, is the best one for recording videos. The sound is very clear. I've noticed that it will pick up background noise so be sure to record in a quiet setting. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BreE-Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic headset for meetings!
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my old Microsoft headset that had a frayed cord. I was trying to keep the price low for a good pair and I'm so glad I chose this headset! Not only is the sound quality fantastic, nose cancellation is great, but the mic is perfect and easy to adjust. I use it for business meetings with my team and clients directly and I have been complimented on how crystal clear my voice comes through! Absolutely recommend this headset to anyone who doesn't want to spend a lot but wants top notch qaulity and comfort!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Rolland

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for remote work
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the over-ear variety like this product because it doesn't hurt from constant use. The external mic and comfortable padding make this easy to use for long durations. Audio quality is great. Your own voice is a bit muffled though, so it is a bit different from the norm when you are speaking a lot. Most importantly, it filters out the incoming audio so others in the vicinity do not have to listen to it. Great for work-from-home, which was the main reason for this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: violinsolo

customer_reviews.title: Heads Up on Head Phones
customer_reviews.text: Given the price these are extremely comfortable. I was impresed equally by the sound quality. The microphone works but does seem to need more volume set for it to properly register but in terms of value for dollar spent this is a very good buy. I would recommend them not just for gaming but for any software that needs a headphone and a mike. Examples such as Skype and FaceTime worked well with the headset as does Rosetta Stone. So while the target may be gamers these are useful for other purposes as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chimester

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for a non-gamer as well
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a headset in a hurry to be able to take calls over my PC due to COVID-19 isolation at home. Frankly I ordered this because it was inexpensive and could come quickly. Turned out to be a great choice - the sound is great and it's much more comfortable to wear than an in-your-ear piece. Plus it blocks out a lot of noise. A LOT of noise. And the sound is good enough that I just listened to a concert online and chose to wear the headset rather than playing over speakers. Would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Nice Gaming headset!
customer_reviews.text: This headset does a great job and sealing off all outside noise and makes the gaming experience lively. the LED light makes it look more legit as well. The cord also feels pretty sturdy and looks like much thought went into making this device. Some things you should consider is that it is bulky and may not fit those of a smaller head. My 5 year old tried them on and had a hard time keeping them on but fit me quite well. A good product and may also work with other gaming platforms however you may have to look into your platform's settings to get it right. I use it on my mac.
customer_reviews.author: fig

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work so great on my Macbook
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for video conferencing. I use a Macbook. People told me they heard static when I was speaking. I switched to a different headset and the static went away. I later tried these again on my Macbook with the same results. So I gave this headset to my wife (she uses a PC) and she hasn't had any problems. These are very bass heavy on both Mac and PC so I wouldn't use these for music. I imagine that extra bass would enhance gaming.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear. Sound isn't bad (only had it for a few hours). Have not listened to any music so unable to comment on the sub-harmonics but the upper frequencies seem clear and crisp. Bought it for doing video conference meetings. Will see how they do with Discord and WOW. the instructions have much to be desired. Print is WAY toooo sssmmmmaaalllllll box, instructions, card insert and here are all different addresses found that the URL posted in the Amazon feedback is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Balkor

customer_reviews.title: Great sound with noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.text: I like the headset. I am using it for my online class. It has really good sound and has noise cancellation function. My laptop makes noises when it is over-heated. When I take online classes, I can’t talk in my class because it records the noises. I have tried other headset I have but it does not work. This headset is really good, no more noises, my voice is clear, and the sound is great. I have been using it for more than a month and love it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Loan Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Functional; not compatible with my computer programs
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset to replace a USB headset whose ear pads were disintegrating from age. This new headset appears OK when tested with AUDACITY but in both Zoom meetings and Discord sessions, there appears to be a throbbing, super-sonic feedback. If I reduce microphone gain so low the oscillation stops, remote users can not hear me. Cannot further explain it, but I had to switch to another old USB headset to get back on-the-air.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome Whelan

customer_reviews.title: It quit working today during my tutoring lesson.
customer_reviews.text: I have hardly used these headphones as I just began teaching last week. That is how long it took to get all my information to the tutoring company. As I began today's 2nd lesson they did not work. I had used them 5 min. before during my first lesson and when I was ready to begin they didn't work. The poor student, who is all the way in China, didn't know what to do. Neither did I know what to do as she wasn't right next to me. Oh well, they were great while they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Verlee Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: 7.1....yea no
customer_reviews.text: Cant even download the drivers for these headphones as the website does not exist. Avoid these and all there types. ill be filing a return shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Angell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent headset...software a bit lacking
customer_reviews.text: I bought this headset for online DJing, and for calls on Discord, Skype, etc., not for gaming. I'm very pleased. They are super comfortable, very cushioned, and you don't hear ANYTHING from the room around you. Outside sounds don't get in at all. Build quality seems very good and I hope they hold up. Right now, they feel super solid, and I expect they will. I ended up uninstalling the software because it really doesn't add anything. The pseudo 7.1 surround is pointless. It doesn't sound like surround sound at all, but I don't detract from the headphones for this.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Keels

customer_reviews.title: Sound stops working.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my son for distance learning. After about 5 weeks the sound started making noise and then a few days later it stopped all together. My son has had his iPad for 3 years and it’s still in great shape and the Nintendo Switch since it came out. No issues. So he’s not the kinda kid who breaks well made stuff. Of course Amazons return policy is 30 days. Hard pass for this one.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly adequate wired headphones. If they were wireless or more expensive I would not be happy.
customer_reviews.text: Works well, right out of the box. I haven’t installed the software (not sure if I will bother to get IT to do it). While wearing them but not actively on a call or listening to music, I get some amplified ‘rubbing’ noise from the cord and also from anything touching the ear cups (like my jacket collar). These headphones seem to be perfectly adequate for what I need, so I’m happy. For the price I paid I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Truthfully

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the cushioning on this headset. I don't game so much anymore, I bought this headset for all my Zoom\Webex meetings during the work-from-home because of COVID. Some most of my meetings were back-to-back all day... Not a problem with this headset. No need to blow out your eardrums as just putting them on pretty much deadens the ambient sound so a volume is good enough. No additional driver needed, was plug-and-play for me. My only complaint is the hinge on the inline control box, it seem weak and will likely break at some point from minimal use, a minor detail in an otherwise great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Dubs

customer_reviews.title: Weighs a ton. Can’t wear for long
customer_reviews.text: This headset is HEAVY. I needed a solid headset for online work meetings. Goals were - USB (not bluetooth, no batteries, plug & play) - not too pricey - good noise cancelling - boom mic w noise reduction - comfy This ticks all the boxes except that is HEAVY!! My neck hurts after about 30 minutes on a call. There’s no way I can wear this for a full work day.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Dweller

customer_reviews.title: Amazing headsets!
customer_reviews.text: These headsets are amazing and one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon. I'm one of those guys who has to have the sound just 'perfect' before watching a movie or listening to music. These headsets meet all my criteria for good sound! Also, during these days of 'social distancing', I have several video conference calls that I conduct for work. They are perfect for that as well! Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: BrianV

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by the quality of noise cancellation, it doesn't cancel it out, but it does muffle a lot of background noise. We use these mostly for discord calls while playing games online, the voice and game sounds are clear. Very comfortable to use so far, lots of padding on the ears. My 15 year old has an industrial piercing and usually can't wear over the ear headsets because of the pressure, but he has no problem with these.
customer_reviews.author: pinkcookie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty darn good wired headset for the price
customer_reviews.text: Been using this headset for a while now. The mic quality is clear my friends have no problems understanding me. Also the inline mixer works well and is convenient for changing volume on the fly. Sound quality is on par with that of any brand name headset I've tried. My favorite part is the build quality, lots of metal and solid feel. Should hold up to long term use quite well. Overall impressed for the price point! Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Krzeminski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and crystal clear audio
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this to make calls easier on my desktop. I tried having headphones with a 3.5mm jack and splitter but it resulted in really faint audio on my recipient's end for some reason. This is simple plug and play with a USB that makes it ridiculously easy to use. I find the more subdued look with black and and nice rainbow accent to be preferable compared to the more gaudy looking gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.author: HelloItsIo

customer_reviews.title: For a teacher to do remote instruction
customer_reviews.text: I am a middle school teacher and wanted a quality but affordable headset for remote teaching using my school laptop (Lenovo L390 Yoga Win 10). I love that the headset was plug & play, has REALLY good mic quality (did a test recording right after plugging in, and the ear phones don't hurt (I have kind of big ears, and they size works well). My teenage daughter loves the look. "You're a gamer, Mom!"
customer_reviews.author: Tami Brass

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing compared to name brand headsets
customer_reviews.text: The main thing I did not like is the monitor feature was nearly useless. The volume level was so low at even the max setting that I couldn’t hear myself. I could only hear very loud sounds like tapping on the mic. It was also very tight on my head. The volume control is an awkward distance where it wouldn’t sit on the desk but was hanging and bumping into it. No control for game/chat volume balance. The sound quality seemed OK I guess. I returned it, I’ll stick with the brand that I know I like.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Headset is great
customer_reviews.text: One. I have a hard time finding a gaming head set that fit my small head. All the ones I’ve like have been to big and fall off. THIS ONE FITS GREAT. overall sound quality is decent. Noise cancellation I’m not really sure about. I wouldn’t say it 100% cancels out all noise. But it does for a fact cover my ears so things are muffled around me. Honest for the price and the look I would say it’s a great head set.
customer_reviews.author: creativemind

customer_reviews.title: They are good headphones but it may not be what you want.
customer_reviews.text: The surround sound aspect of these headphones is nothing to write home about but the noise cancellation aspect is top-notch. The amount of noise bleeding produced by this headphone is remarkably bad, you can just listen to music with the headphones off and get a near-identical sound experience. This is sad because I am enjoying the product but I could not use this quietly in a library or when my significant other is sleeping without being a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: KodeDudeXOtakuwife

customer_reviews.title: Decent, entry level headphone mic setup
customer_reviews.text: These is a nice entry level headset/mic. It’s a little on the heavy side and the mic is not able to change sides, it’s permanently on the left. The instructions are difficult to use and the software used is in .rar format (which is easy enough to extract). I’d like to give it a 3-1/2, but couldn’t. All in all, not too bad, for the price. Just more mass produced, inexpensively made products that seem to flood Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Charlie M.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but mine came used!
customer_reviews.text: I watched someone on Youtube do an unboxing and was impressed with what I saw. Unfortunately mine did not come in nicely sealed box and a cloth carry bag. Although I was unhappy with the packaging, the product seems very nice. Thick ear pads and good sound blocking! Still looking for the drivers to try the 7.1, but plug and play sounds good!
customer_reviews.author: Jason D.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this headset
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this headset. My first one lasted almost a year but broke because I sat on it on accident. Before that it was working perfectly and I could see it lasting much longer. The audio quality is pretty good. I use it when gaming and I am never disappointed with the sound quality. The mic works well and I am always using it to talk on Discord with friends. A nice headset for those with a budget that still want quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works fine as headset but 7.1 virtual surround doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: 7.1 virtual sound software won't install. First it's a nightmare to download from their Chinese-only language website. I was only able to find the link by coming to this amazon page and getting it from other reviewers' comments. Then the installer experiences errors and won't install. So I was never able to get the 7.1 to work. It does work great as a regular stereo headset though.
customer_reviews.author: AndrewNYC22

customer_reviews.title: Not so great
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for another headset for my home office and came across this model. I already own Mpow EG3 Pro and liked them, but were not available at the time of purchase. 1) sound is inferior to MPOW 2) unless you have a child's size head you'll find the width to small and try to stretch out the headset at which point you'll find a broken headset. 3) MPOW EG3 Pro became available and is a way superior product and has a metal headset bar which will accommodate some stretching out if it's found to be to small. Sound is way better also...
customer_reviews.author: JIG

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Phenomenal Headset
customer_reviews.text: Mic quality is crystal clear and the headphones themselves do a fantastic job at defining the outside world. The rainbow light on them is static and can be turned off. The sound is nothing short of amazing out of the box, and if it isn't enough the software is more than enough to give it that extra punch if needed. You can fine tune every angle of this headsets 7.1 channel surround system.Unbeatable headset that can match much higher priced ones. Compared to the Sony WH1000XM3, a near 300 dollar headphone, this one IMO matches and exceeds.
customer_reviews.author: Domingo

customer_reviews.title: Fresh out of the box- better than some top of the line headphones I have used for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Ok...first of all- they are gorgeous looking headphones. Sleek and study, these do NOT feel like $25 headphone at all. Second of all- between the noise cancelling, and the quality of sound- when I game, I hear things I have never heard before in Overwatch- which I have played daily since release- and in all honesty, it makes the game feel new. Will update this review in a few weeks after I have 100 or so hours of use into them.
customer_reviews.author: keith williams

customer_reviews.title: My little gamer loves these!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality in these headphones is amazing. I compare them to my Bose True Wireless headphones with the bass, mid range and treble clarity. They also do a great job of blocking out exterior noise as well. I plugged these into my laptop on the plane and I heard nothing but the sounds coming from my movie on my laptop, no airplane noise of the sound of the crying baby in the seat in front of me. It was a nice relaxing flight with these on my head.
customer_reviews.author: BCBK

customer_reviews.title: Budget price headphones that feel like $100 headphones.
customer_reviews.text: You know what most budget headphones feel like? They have thin plastic headbands, thin strand cables, and dont completely cover your ears. These headphones have none of those qualities. The headphones are heavy and sturdy. The cables are thick with good protective covering. The volume control is half the size of a deck of cards. I am hoping these headphones are the ones that last more then 6 months, I will update again then. So far, I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chad W. Green

customer_reviews.title: nice for the price, but
customer_reviews.text: The placement of the buttons is a bit odd. To mute the mic, you have to use a tiny little slide switch on the side of the control mechanism on the cord. Yet, there is a big, nice lit button right in the center of the controller which is used to turn off and on the LED for the ear piece. If they swapped those, I would be keeping this headset. I will most likely return this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kevino

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a much more expensive headset
customer_reviews.text: Other than the rotary pots for volumes this headset looks and feels like a much more expensive headset. The sound quality is great, the ear cups are comfortable for a big headed guy like me and the cable is quiet. I would buy another if I needed to, though hopefully this one will last. I'm not sure why it asks about noise cancellation in the ratings since this set does not have active noise cancellation, but noise isolation is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Teacher of MS students

customer_reviews.title: It is great for everything
customer_reviews.text: I like this product because it is useful for gaming and school. The noise cancellation helps with paying attention while still being aware of my surroundings. The microphone is useful because it means that I don’t have to have a separate device to capture sound. The is long enough for it to va able to be used with gaming consoles and can easily be used with a computer as well. The sound quality is very good and I would definitely recommend it to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: BoriquanMami

customer_reviews.title: These are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like over-the-ear headphones. I've used them all my life. The Logitech USB headphones I've been using, while they sound good, are just not comfortable for me. Not only are these headphones comfortable, they sound really good. I also like the volume controls for both the earpieces and the microphone, plus the mute button. I use these for my on-line teaching.
customer_reviews.author: George M. Badger

customer_reviews.title: Only two months of use and it breaks.
customer_reviews.text: After only two months of use to the day. The plastic breaks right across the screws holding the earpiece on the headband. Completely broken .. duct tape to the rescue!! As you can see it says "Made in China".
customer_reviews.author: R Bowen

customer_reviews.title: excellent for price
customer_reviews.text: i use these primarily for work, i became exhausted with buying expensive 'professional' headsets only for them to expire a few weeks into use or develop some kind of driver incompatibility issue. these are supposed to be for gaming, but they are excellent for professional grade work. its comfortable for long wear and is very durable. i've accidentally dropped it numerous times and it's still holding on without issue. audio quality is amazing given the price point - phonecalls, music, games - the audio is frankly superb. would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality and spacial sense
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before selecting this gaming headset and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. Coming from some ATH-M50X's, these are 10x more comfortable and I love that you can fold up the microphone. The sound quality is excellent! I'm using Windows Server so couldn't install the software (got an error when trying) but the built-in "Windows Sonic for Headphones" works great for gaming to know where enemies are walking. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: So far so Good!
customer_reviews.text: just got the headphones. so far so good. hopefully it will continue to be great. the only thing is the headphone fit so snug, i cant hear myself when i talk and that feels funny to me. i prefer to hear myself when i talk. but i think this is a feature needed to block outside noise? i know other headphones do the same so i wont knock this one for that. just a personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: P. Oyelakin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for audio playback and Zoom calls
customer_reviews.text: I'm no pro gamer by any means, but with school being online I'm on my laptop a lot. I got tired of switching between a pair of headphones for music and a headset for Zoom calls, so I bought these. They sound way better than both pairs and pick up my voice crystal clear. They're a little tighter and fluffier than I'm used to though. Works better for noise cancellation. Overall for the $25 I paid I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: A.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Noise Cancellation and Awesome Build Quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a PC Gamer, This is my 10th pair of computer headset. The comfort of these are Nice . Their rigid enough to hold their form, but flexible enough to not smash your head. The microphone is great and picks up the sound without issue. is just beautiful. Definitely has quality built in, great for voice chat and/or music. I definitely recommend to anyone looking for a functional PC headset, without breaking your bank.
customer_reviews.author: Hazar Nikon  Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous Bluetooth headphones but the Bluetooth on my PC stopped working properly. So I got these. They are great. Sound quality is great. Only thing that isn’t as good as my previous headphones was the noise canceling isn’t very good. Considering My PC is in the living room I hear most things... but honestly with The sound quality I just turn it up and tone things out. Lol.
customer_reviews.author: Marlana Perrett

customer_reviews.title: How is this such a highly rated item?
customer_reviews.text: Way too expensive for something with horrible sound quality and static. Uncomfortable on the ears as well and i have average sized ears. It came delivered with other boxes but this is the only item that looks like it got ran over. And having to download software for this thing to work "properly" sounds like an invite to a malware party for something that should be tweeked properly to begin with at this price. There is way better out there at this price and i dont recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: greg

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable all day
customer_reviews.text: The first thing I noticed after trying these out is that they are are comfortable no matter how long I wear them. 15 minute tutorial watching session on YT? Comfy. All day work session, chatting with associates over ZOOM? Easy- zero fatigue on my ears or the top of my head. Definitely recommend them for anyone who is working from home!
customer_reviews.author: mineyourbiz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gamers!
customer_reviews.text: Great gaming headphones. They come really nicely packaged. The headphones are comfortable to wear, good quality, and noise canceling. There is a controller attached to the cord that has a clip if you want to clip it on your shirt. The controller has volume control, and a mic on/off switch. It was easy to connect. You just plug them in and they work. The headphones have some cool lighting on them too. Overall, good bang for your buck. I would recommend them to all gamers.
customer_reviews.author: Jack.n.Emma.n.Ringo.too

customer_reviews.title: OMG, they fit
customer_reviews.text: I had partial jaw replacement and cannot take tight headset against my head. Not only did these fit nicely and did not try and power fit my face to the headset, but the sound quality is really surprisingly good for a $50 set. Mic was great when I connected to Discord too...oh, as a plus, I cannot hear my grand kids yelling or my neighbors boom boom boom and such when I am trying to raid
customer_reviews.author: Aoibheil

customer_reviews.title: Truly noise cancelling!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to take WebEx/Zoom/Skype conference calls when I work remote. They are truly noise cancelling to the point where you almost can’t hear yourself speak. The microphone itself also has a separate volume control from the headphones, so you can adjust it for your audience and how close you like to place the mic to your mouth. That feature is a game changer from most headsets. These are also absolutely amazing to watch movies, listen to music, or even just sleep on airplanes. The noise cancelling feature is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie J

customer_reviews.title: Used For Work - Not used for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: Headphones were great; when they worked. For some reason they would unpredictably disconnect from my work/phone application (ours is called 8x8) and would end the phone or conference call. Only way to reconnect it would be to close the application and call or join the conference again. Tried everything as far as updating apps and configuring the device and connection portals. Could never have a stable 10 minute conversation without it happening. Noise cancelation wasnt bad, but wasnt good either.. Sound quality was good,, but not for me or my work
customer_reviews.author: eryk

customer_reviews.title: Fit great; over 4 hours straight usage without discomfort!
customer_reviews.text: Great value, great product! Not only did it come exactly as described, it has more built-in hardware features than expected. I have worn these nearly everyday for gaming (4-6hrs at a time!), watching YouTube videos, and even a couple of long, streamed, movies, all without any discomfort. I'm rarely impressed with gear these days, but these are definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: DDTechGuy

customer_reviews.title: This is a must have headset for gamers and podcasters on the go!
customer_reviews.text: At this at this price point I was a little skeptical... I usually take this headset when I podcast on the go... The microphone is much better than I had anticipated so when I'm on the road producing content it's pretty good. the sound quality coming out of the speakers is excellent! The bill quality is high-level and top-notch. It's like getting a premium headset for the price of a budget headset. If you're looking for an excellent gaming headset or something to podcast on the go with or even to have is your Skype call go to this is it! Well done! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Big Ray Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work with games but not Skype or Zoom :(
customer_reviews.text: Decent headset for the price, especially if you only plan to use it for gaming. I was hoping it would be a versatile device but that is not the case. I have consistent issues with meetings because of this headset. I will be replacing these to avoid yet another interruption because a client or coworker could not hear me well. Switching to my iPhone always does the trick but you'd think this would be able to handle simple online calls. Beware. Especially with the pandemic situation and more of us working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Solid gaming headset with external controls
customer_reviews.text: I plugged this up and was happy to hear the results. The sound quality is good and I enjoy the external controls for both microphone volume and headphone speaker volume. The USB cable is long enough that I can just plug it into my PC tower and not worry about disconnecting it when I move around on my desk chair. The cups feel comfortable over my ears and the band is not noticeable on the top of my head. Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bobasaurus

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: Dont think it's possible to find a headset this great for such a low price. The sound quality could be better but it's not bad by any means. The noise cancellation is surprisingly good. The features are very functional and come in handy for gaming. Mic volume, headset volume, and a mic on/off. The lighting is a bit cheesy, but I always turn those things off anyway. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Joshua French

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old pair of headphones as they weren't properly shaped for long hours of wear. With quarantine I've spent more time gaming/streaming on Twitch and these have been so comfortable on my ears. The sound quality is amazing and the fact that I only need to plug it into the USB to work has been a god send. Would highly recommend if you're not sure what to use and need something cheaper but of good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

product_meta.title: Jeecoo USB Pro Gaming Headset for PC- 7.1 Surround Sound Headphones with Noise Cancelling Mic- Memory Foam Ear Pads RGB Lights for Laptops
feature_bullets: [7.1 Virtual Surround Sound]: 50mm speaker unit neodymium magnets, built-in USB audio sound card with 7.1 surround sound; all game sound effects & details will come to your ears to provide immersive gaming experience.

[Noise Cancelling Mic]: Jeecoo customized unidirectional microphone reduces ambient noise for enhanced voice quality, to pick up your voice clearly and loudly. Retractable; easily to switch ON/OFF, adjustable microphone volume.

[Multifunctional & Convenient Controller]: Gaming headphones with in-line controller: volume adjuster, mic volume adjuster, mic ON/OFF, LED light ON/OFF. There is a clip so that you can attach it onto your T-shirt for convenient controls.

[High Quality Building]: The PC headset has sturdy construction, adjustable metal headband, flexible microphone, thick memory foam cushion pads, big & soft earmuff, tangle-free cord & decent package. Exclusively made for pro gamers, you can enjoy a long & comfortable gaming session.
[Compatibility]: Headset with USB plug, compatible with PC, laptops, MAC devices. Software is easy to download and install for 7.1 surround sound effect.
